definition: to learn/to acquire (some skill through practice)/acquisition
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

pinyin: xi2 de2 xing4 wu2 zhu4 gan3

sentences.english: Some business skills can’t be taught in a classroom. Theyhave to be learned through experience.
sentences.chinese: 有些商業技巧課堂中教不了，必須通過經驗習得。

sentences.english: But most emotional triggers are learned.
sentences.chinese: 但多數情緒觸點是習得的。

sentences.english: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent or absorbing positive knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 幻想的天份，對我而言，比才能和知識習得都重要。

sentences.english: All your other fears were acquired.
sentences.chinese: 其它的恐懼是後天習得的。

sentences.english: In this study, a hypothesis is proposed that.
sentences.chinese: 本文假設，聯結對詞彙習得有顯著效果。

sentences.english: That L2 learners are instructed to notice forms feature will facilitate the acquisition of FMCs.
sentences.chinese: 如能讓學習者兼顧形式特徵，會有利於二語習得。

sentences.english: When is the best period for second language learning?
sentences.chinese: 習得第二語言的最佳時期在何時？

sentences.english: It becomes progressively more difficult to acquire language after the age at which lateralization is complete.
sentences.chinese: 在側化完成的年齡之後，習得語言變得越來越難。

sentences.english: Humour is learned behaviour, Mr Rodgers says.
sentences.chinese: “幽默是後天習得的行爲，”羅傑斯表示。

sentences.english: Now she mainly focuses on the second language acquisition and the third language acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 現致力於第二語言及第三語言習得的相關研究。

sentences.english: Shield Slam is now available to all warriors, starting at level 40.
sentences.chinese: 盾牌猛擊40級時能從技能訓練師處習得。

sentences.english: Many of the behaviours that children acquire at home would be counterproductive elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在家習得的許多行爲在別處則是有害無益的。

sentences.english: One is unconscious acquisition and the other is conscious apprehension.
sentences.chinese: 獲取方式有無意識習得和有意識領悟。

sentences.english: To answer this, we need to consider how morals are learned.
sentences.chinese: 爲了回答這個問題，我們需要思考道德是如何習得的。

sentences.english: However, the importance of vocabulary learning and teaching in SLA has been neglected for many decades.
sentences.chinese: 然而，第二語言習得中詞彙的教與學卻被人們忽略了。

sentences.english: Sadly, we never learn from a lot that happens to us.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，我們雖遭遇許多事，卻不曾從中習得功課。

definition: to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
